div.p: >>> FACTOR FOLLOW UP SEGMENT TONIGHT, AMERICAN DOCTORS

DOCTORS ABOUT THE AFFORDABLE HEALTHCARE ACT.

61% OF THEM SAY THEIR OPINION OF OBAMACARE HAS
CHANGED FOR THE WORSE. EVEN MORE DAMNING, 44% OF
AMERICAN DOCTORS SAY THEY WILL NOT PARTICIPATE IN THE
OBAMACARE EXCHANGE. A DISASTER.
WITH US NOW DR. EMANUEL, ONE OF THE ARCHITECTS OF THE
AFFORDABLE HEALTHCARE ACT AND AUTHOR OF THE BRAND NEW
BIG BOOK "REINVENTING AMERICAN HEALTHCARE."
